Name: sot-sheikheliaskeke
Author: Sheikh Elias Keketso Lelia
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa (IDM)

Translations.Text: Phehisano ea pokello ea matlotlo e le khelositse
Che! Hoja le na le tsebo e tehileng
Hobane le tla bona mollo oa Lihele
Hape le tla o bona ka tiieo
Letsatsing leo le tla botsoa khahlano le monyaka oa lefatsâ€™e lena
